item.title: Mysql auto backup to Dropbox
item.description: In this article, I’m gonna show you how you can easily configure an auto backup Mysql database to a Dropbox account using Mysqldump and Cron jobs on an Ubuntu server. Set up the Dropbox To store the backup files in Dropbox, You’ll need, of course, a Dropbox account and an API Key associated with it. Go to your Dropbox account and generate an API Key and save it. Backup Let’s make a backup with the mysqldump command:
